chunks.zh: 24 款极氪 001 上市，很是心动
chunks.en: The 2024 Zeekr 001 is on the market, and I'm very tempted.

chunks.zh: YOU 版：100 度麒麟电池四驱，续航 705km ，百公里加速 3.3s ，双腔空悬，激光雷达，雅马哈音箱，电动门，分区天幕，32.9 万元；
chunks.en: YOU Version: 100 kWh Qilin battery, four-wheel drive, 705km range, 0-100km/h acceleration in 3.3s, dual-chamber air suspension, lidar, Yamaha audio, electric doors, partitioned sunroof, 329,000 yuan;

chunks.zh: ME 版：100 度麒麟电池四驱，705km ，3.3s ，双腔空悬，激光雷达，雅马哈音箱，29.9 万元；
chunks.en: ME Version: 100 kWh Qilin battery, four-wheel drive, 705km, 3.3s, dual-chamber air suspension, lidar, Yamaha audio, 299,000 yuan;

chunks.zh: WE 版：95 度神行电池四驱，675km ，3.5s ，激光雷达，雅马哈音箱，真皮座椅，26.9 万元；
chunks.en: WE Version: 95 kWh Shenxing battery, four-wheel drive, 675km, 3.5s, lidar, Yamaha audio, leather seats, 269,000 yuan;

chunks.zh: WE 版：100 度麒麟电池后驱，750km ，5.9s ，激光雷达，雅马哈音箱，真皮座椅，26.9 万元；
chunks.en: WE Version: 100 kWh Qilin battery, rear-wheel drive, 750km, 5.9s, lidar, Yamaha audio, leather seats, 269,000 yuan;

chunks.zh: 什么 we me you 版哪个脑瘫想出来的命名方式
chunks.en: What kind of brain-dead person came up with the we me you version naming scheme?

chunks.zh: 看完昨天发布会，感觉果然新能源车正处于快速迭代期，等过几年稳定一些下辆一定。毕竟以现在迭代的速度，估计我会每两年心动一次😁
chunks.en: After watching yesterday's press conference, I feel that new energy vehicles are indeed in a period of rapid iteration. I'll definitely get one after a few years when things are more stable. After all, at the current rate of iteration, I estimate I'll be tempted every two years. 😁

chunks.zh: @wxw752 原来在这等着呢。。
chunks.en: @wxw752 So that's where you were waiting...

chunks.zh: @BeforeTooLate #71 可能在他眼中宝马是高不可攀的品牌   所以好不容易凑够 X1 的钱了一定要买一辆光宗耀祖
chunks.en: @BeforeTooLate #71 Maybe in his eyes, BMW is an unattainable brand, so he finally scraped together enough money for an X1 and had to buy one to bring glory to his ancestors.

chunks.zh: @captain55 是什么样的没脑子韭菜会在现在去买 X1
chunks.en: @captain55 What kind of brainless leek would buy an X1 now?

chunks.zh: 这个车劝退我的就是有点宽
chunks.en: The only thing that deters me from this car is that it's a bit wide.

chunks.zh: 投降吧军儿，外面都是吉利
chunks.en: Surrender, Jun'er, it's all Geely out there.

chunks.zh: 智能化方面，有点难顶的，毕竟 Intel 是极氪的股东，001 深度捆绑 Mobileye ，没办法换； Mobileye 的 Q6H 芯片明年才上市，今年只能继续用 Q5H*2 ，不过不知道为什么不堆 Q5H*4 ，可能是他们觉得他们走的技术路线，48TOPS 的专用芯片足够他们的 SuperVision 使用吧。
chunks.en: In terms of intelligence, it's a bit difficult, because Intel is a shareholder of Zeekr, and the 001 is deeply tied to Mobileye, so it can't be changed. Mobileye's Q6H chip will only be available next year, and this year they can only continue to use Q5H*2, but I don't know why they don't stack Q5H*4. Maybe they think that the technical route they are taking, the 48TOPS dedicated chip is enough for their SuperVision to use.

chunks.zh: 不过 Mobileye 他们主打的就是一个众包地图 REM ，只要搭载他们的车在路上走的多，扫的数据够多，就能把高阶辅助驾驶做好，但 REM 又有国内的测绘等一系列问题，所以表现就很差。
chunks.en: However, Mobileye's main focus is a crowdsourced map REM. As long as the cars equipped with their system drive on the road a lot and scan enough data, they can improve the advanced assisted driving. But REM has a series of problems such as domestic surveying and mapping, so the performance is very poor.

chunks.zh: 打断雷子施法。。。
chunks.en: Interrupting Lei Zi's spellcasting...

chunks.zh: 极氪 阿维塔 外观我是真的喜欢😍
chunks.en: I really like the appearance of Zeekr and Avatr 😍

chunks.zh: @captain55 #100 笑死人了😂
chunks.en: @captain55 #100 Laughing to death 😂

chunks.zh: @qoo2019 #4 磷酸铁锂肯定比三元锂便宜呀
chunks.en: @qoo2019 #4 Lithium iron phosphate is definitely cheaper than ternary lithium.

chunks.zh: 空气悬挂寿命 5 年，到时候换一根 1w 起步。
chunks.en: Air suspension has a lifespan of 5 years, and it will cost 10,000 yuan to replace one at that time.

chunks.zh: @captain55 这个价位身边极客和蔚来，理想不要太多。现阶段，你是怎么还说得出这些话的啊？
chunks.en: @captain55 At this price point, there are so many Geeks, Nio and Li Auto around. How can you still say these things at this stage?

chunks.zh: 就算今年必须买，也务必要忍到六月之后
chunks.en: Even if you have to buy this year, be sure to wait until after June.

chunks.zh: @wnanbei 96 楼  @livid 人身攻击
chunks.en: @wnanbei 96th floor @livid personal attack

chunks.zh: @captain55 #70 看笑了，x1 哈哈
chunks.en: @captain55 #70 Laughing, X1 haha

chunks.zh: 本来想换车，但是昨天给我的 13 年的 gti6 代换了个 carplay 车机，动力 娱乐也都够了，再战 10 年 哈哈哈哈
chunks.en: I originally wanted to change cars, but yesterday I replaced the carplay head unit in my 2013 GTI 6th generation. The power and entertainment are sufficient, so I'll fight for another 10 years hahaha.

chunks.zh: @captain55 不如去 pdd,27w 全干 bba 标 直接贴脑门上得了
chunks.en: @captain55 You might as well go to PDD, get a full-option BBA for 270,000 yuan and stick the logo directly on your forehead.
